column7: Excellent Italian Food complimented with attentive service

column7: Just don't order the ice cream (gelato)

column7: Their pizzas are getting better and better

column7: Nice restaurant on top of a excavation museum

I never get disappointed, when I come here for lunch. The pizza was delicious (and really italian style) and the price was affordable. The outside garden is one of the best places in Lund to enjoy food, when the sun is shining. Full thumbs up!

column7: A taste of Italy in Lund
